Author Biographies
Hyesoo Yoo is a PhD candidate in music education at the
University of Florida. She is a general and choral music special-
ist, lecturer, and guest conductor for multicultural music.
Sangmi Kang is a doctoral student in music education at the
University of Florida. She is a general music specialist and a pro-
fessional performer on the Gayageum (Korean string instrument).
